title: Personal Journal
desc: My personal journal! I write about my life, my thoughts, and my experiences. I also display some of my original artworks.

title: JDIH Kemlu
desc: Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Indonesia's Legal Information Center (JDIH) website. This website is used to manage and display legal documents.

title: Sedjuk Bakmi & Kopi
desc: A brand website for a noodle and coffee restaurant. This website features company information, locations, menu, and gallery.

title: AYANA AI Chatbot
desc: A chatbot for AYANA Resort and Spa Bali. This chatbot is designed to help customers book rooms, check availability, and answer frequently asked questions.

title: Braga Technologies
desc: A company website for Braga Technologies, displaying the company's profile, services, and portfolio. Notably, I am really proud of this website's complex animations.

title: Employee Virtual Assistant
desc: A virtual assistant for employees. This chatbot is designed to help employees with their daily tasks, such as scheduling meetings, and inquiries.

title: Effie
desc: Effie is a web-based application that helps users to manage links. It's like a Google Drive for links! Or maybe a next level bookmarking tool.

title: Langbot
desc: A language-learning chatbot app I created as a gift for my IISMA mentees. This chatbot is designed to help them learn their target languages in real-life conversational situations.

title: Hyundai E-Kiosk
desc: An e-kiosk application for Hyundai Motor Company enabling customers to order spare parts and services independently without having to speak with staffs.

title: Hyundai QMS
desc: A queueing management system built for Hyundai Motor Company. This system is used to manage the queue of customers waiting to get their cars serviced.

title: Architecture 3D Mock Portfolio
desc: A 3D mock portfolio for an architecture student. This website features a 3D model of a building that can be rotated and zoomed in.

title: Wispril ITB 2022
desc: A graduation website created to celebrate the April 2022 graduation of ITB students. This website includes features like wall of fame, success stories, and more.

title: Happy Birthday!
desc: A personal project to celebrate my friends' birthdays. This website enables all of our friends to write birthday wishes and messages for the birthday person, as well as upload photos and videos.

title: Joyume
desc: Joyume offers kids a unique experience of customising and personalising their own toys, called 'Joyu Friends', which will be specifically created and delivered upon order.

title: Wisjul ITB 2022
desc: A graduation website created to celebrate the July 2021 graduation of ITB students. I created the landing page, complete with elaborate animations and interactions.

title: Mealth
desc: A website featuring a chatbot. Mealth is a safe, comfortable, and supportive space seeking to help and raise awareness about eating disorders in Indonesia.

title: Deoxyde
desc: A school project implementing string matching and regular expression for a mock DNA matching to detect illnesses.
